alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Hill (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 8:27PM MDT until August 12 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Blaine County in north central Montana... Northeastern Hill County in north central Montana... * Until 915 PM MDT. * At 827 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 22 miles northwest of Havre to 9 miles west of Beaver Creek, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Havre, Chinook, Beaver Creek, Lohman, Kremlin and Cleveland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
